name: St. Lucian of Antioch

locations.description: Priest and biblical scholar in Antioch

summary: Lucian was a priest and biblical scholar in Antioch who produced a critical edition of the Greek Bible known as the 'Lucianic recension.' He was martyred during the Diocletianic persecution. His biblical text was influential in the Eastern Church, and he is considered a forerunner of Arianism by some scholars.
